SQL.LOAD: SELECT ERE.EQUIPMENT_ID, ERE.CHILD_EQUIPMENT_ID, ERE.IS_IN_OEM_BOX_ID, ERE.IS_COVERED_ID, ERE.RELATED_EQUIPMENT_ID, EQ.DESCRIPTION, EQ.MODEL, EQ.MANUFACTURER_ID, EQ.EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID, ERE.CREATED_DATE CREATED_DATE, ERE.CREATED_BY CREATED_BY, ERE.MODIFIED_DATE MODIFIED_DATE, ERE.MODIFIED_BY MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_RELATED_EQUIPMENT ERE INNER JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT EQ ON ERE.CHILD_EQUIPMENT_ID = EQ.EQUIPMENT_ID WHERE RELATED_EQUIPMENT_ID = :RELATED_EQUIPMENT_ID
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT ERE.EQUIPMENT_ID, ERE.CHILD_EQUIPMENT_ID, ERE.IS_IN_OEM_BOX_ID, ERE.IS_COVERED_ID, ERE.RELATED_EQUIPMENT_ID, EQ.DESCRIPTION, EQ.MODEL, EQ.MANUFACTURER_ID, EQ.EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID, ERE.CREATED_DATE CREATED_DATE, ERE.CREATED_BY CREATED_BY, ERE.MODIFIED_DATE MODIFIED_DATE, ERE.MODIFIED_BY MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_RELATED_EQUIPMENT ERE INNER JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT EQ ON ERE.CHILD_EQUIPMENT_ID = EQ.EQUIPMENT_ID WHERE ERE.EQUIPMENT_ID = :EQUIPMENT_ID
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_related_equipment SET equipment_id = :equipment_id, child_equipment_id = :child_equipment_id, is_in_oem_box_id = :is_in_oem_box_id, is_covered_id = :is_covered_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE related_equipment_id = :related_equipment_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_related_equipment ( equipment_id, child_equipment_id, is_in_oem_box_id, is_covered_id, created_by, related_equipment_id ) VALUES ( :equipment_id, :child_equipment_id, :is_in_oem_box_id, :is_covered_id, :created_by, :related_equipment_id )
SQL.GETRELATEDEQUIPMENT: SELECT CHILD_EQUIPMENT_ID ID, EQ.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_RELATED_EQUIPMENT ERE INNER JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT EQ ON EQ.EQUIPMENT_ID = ERE.EQUIPMENT_ID WHERE ERE.EQUIPMENT_ID = :EQUIPMENT_ID
